mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (title, content, country, region, image_url, view_count, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{country}, #{region}, #{imageUrl}, #{viewCount}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, country, region, view_count AS viewCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT id, title, content, country, region, view_count AS viewCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM posts ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT id, title, content, country, region, view_count AS viewCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM posts WHERE region = #{region} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC
